channel.title: Interview on Enrico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Interview on Enrico's Blog

item.title: Failing to be recruited...
item.description: This post title to be frank should have been “Impressions about the selection process of a big Internet company (and my failure to go to the next steps after initial engagement),” but that is obviously too long. So I only kept the failure part with the aim to bring home some lessons from it ! üòè Chronology, more or less It all started with an email at the end of July 2014 from the company’s recruiter, let’s call her Alice.
